name: Cottage Pot Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red capsicum, finely chopped (small to medium)
500 g beef or pork & veal, minced
1 cup frozen veggies - like peas, corn & carrot
1 cup beef stock (increase this by a 1/3 if not using wine)

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all ingredients together into a medium pot on medium heat, add oil, onions, garlic, capsicum and bacon. Saute for about 5 minutes or until veggies have softened.

Add mince, breaking up any lumps, browning for about 4 minutes, add tomato paste to one side of the pot and cook for a minute. Add wine (if using) and cook off for about a minute. Add flour, stir well. Cook stirring for about 2 minutes. Add beef stock and worchestershire sauce. Mix well.
Add in thyme, salt & pepper and frozen veggies. Mix well. Lid on. Turn heat down to low. Simmer for 40 minutes. Lastly add the parsley.
Spoon mixture into 4 x 1 1/2 cup capacity ramekins. Top each one with mashed potato, decorate the top with a fork. Place under a hot grill (200 degrees) until nicely golden.
Serve with steamed veggies of your choice or a fresh Garden Salad and Enjoy!
